snippet: Strategic Hotels and Resorts said on Friday that it had reached a deal to buy the Essex House Hotel from the Dubai Investment Group for about $362.3 million.
abstract: Strategic Hotels and Resorts reaches a deal to buy the Essex House Hotel from the Dubai Investment Group for about $362.3 million.
lead_paragraph: Strategic Hotels and Resorts said on Friday that it had reached a deal to buy the Essex House Hotel from the Dubai Investment Group for about $362.3 million.

headline.main: Essex House Hotel Is Acquired By a Chicago Concern
headline.print_headline: Essex House Hotel Is Acquired By a Chicago Concern
